author: mavster04
title: Healthcare Providers Onboarding
description: In Africa, many health facilities and providers like clinics, health centers, and doctors are still NOT using Medical Records systems that could make their operations more efficient and productive.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal (Healthcare providers onboarding) is a project that has identified a  challenge in our health care facilities and is seeking to curb it. It is believed that in Africa, many healthcare providers do not have a proper system of keeping medical records. For this reason productivity and efficiency is low despite the fact that African has is beginning to have a high number of growing healthcare workers and facilities. There is a challenge in this problem which needs to be solved and the solution to this is the Hippocrades App. The proposers talks of this app which will help solve problems in our our healthcare centers. The project seeks to raise awareness and seek to provide onboard tutorials  and guidlines in the African. There are a lot of challenges in our healthcare facilities which this project seeks to address. This app Hippocrades seeks to provide ready made healthcare modules and solutions like electronic medical records, billing, registration, material management and many more. The app also provides a comprehensive list of healthcare APIs that developers can use not only to add features but also to allow interoperability with other systems. Already, the proposers have already with this healthcare app started giving solutions to doctors and facilities. Fortunately, its is also part of the catalyst funding. This the proposers believe will help the Cardano Community. This will bring value to the Cardano/Catalyst ecosystem because it is already part of the catalyst funding and this has built a decentralized healthcare infrastructure for Cardano. Even the proposers have been selected in the first batch of the  Ariob Incubator / Iceaddis program in Africa which is also supported by Cardano. This means some of the members in the Cardano community are aware of this and therefore many more will join and enjoy the benefits it comes with. The KPIs in the proposal matches the one in the challenge which makes it also relevant because the app provides an amazing set of smart contract in the black chain that allows users to manage and audit their medical records and more. This is also very administrative . This is where it betters operation with data driven business decisions. This project will address future challenges because it has all aspect of departments on it. It tackles Laboratory records, retrieve results when needed, pharmacy, dental and even patient portals. In fact it is Everybody's "go-to app" for all things health. This will be very beneficial to the Cardano ecosystem and Africa as a whole.
f6_assessments.q1:
Hippocrades is a decentralized healthcare infrastructure.
And since the proposer has already started with this, they have the experience and skills to set up this projects. The proposer provided 3 relevant links which elaborated more on what the Hippocrades app can do to the project Healthcare providers onboarding. The links throws more light on how the app works and this is very relevant. The links provides more understanding on how the app works. With a fund of USD 18000, the core team members that will be working on this project are 10 and per their credentials given, they look very qualified in their field areas. The proposal is targeting 3 countries ( Ethiopia, Kenya and Uganda) The proposal is looking at using 4 months to embark on this this project. The proposal has clearly outlined their budget and how it will be utilized.
Month 1 
Team selection
Onboarding to Hippocrades platform
Brainstorming
Planning and setting timeline of activities
Distribution of work
Months 2 - 3
Improve onboarding of Hippocrades.com
Start of content creation
Share to website and groups as materials get done
Social Media posting (Facebook and Linkedin)
Month 4 is assessment of how far the project is going.
There is also clarity of how the budget would be used:
Content / Technical Writer (1)
$1.5T @ 3months
$4.5T
Graphic / Video Artist (2)
$1T @ 3 months
$6T
Project Lead
$500 @ 4 months (spread)
$2T
Research, Meetings, Logistics
$500/mo @ 3
$1.5T
Ads Boosting
$2T/mo @ 2
$ 4T
Total $18,000
Looking at how the project has already been in existence for the past 5 years and part of the Catalyst funding, it still has some needed task to complete therefore there is the likelihood to request for additional funding.
Hippocrades is health infrastructure and platform that other developers can use to build more healthcare apps. Main language used for this app is English but the way the app looks, other developers can use it and perhaps to translate into other languages to benefit the community. The proposers have identified some areas they can use to track the success of this project. There are modules that the proposers will use. The proposers talk of timeline that will be set to task each project to tack the progress of it. There will also be a weekly meetings to track the progress of it. When all these are done, it will mitigate the risk associated to it. This is also an app for all ages.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposers will use the Github even for non technical task to track the progress of this project. Proposers will use this same roadmap to track the achievement of this project. KPIs used for this proposal makes sense. The proposers will use more of the links and the website they have provided to post information, materials , tutorials and other and other vital information would be posted on these websites and links to provide more understanding on this app. The KPIs used makes sense and can also help track the success of the project in a way because the app is independent and other developers can also used and add more aspect to it. This is a project that the community can track it's progress because once it will be used by a medical facility and even has a patient portal, Pharmacy, lab and diagnostic aspect, members in the community can track it progress.

f6_assessments.q0:
The team behind this proposal have built a decentralised healthcare infrastructure on the Cardano blockchain. Now that it’s approaching its final stages of development, improvements and bug fixes the time has come to start marketing it to health care providers, while also offering onboarding guides and tutorials when needed.
The platform they have built is very impressive, and as such, raising awareness of the improvements and capabilities it can offer not just to patients but to doctors, pharmacies and medical facilities, is a reasonable task.
I appreciate how in the beginning, the team has also considered lowering the number of targeted countries to three - Ethiopia, Uganda and Kenya, to ensure the success of the marketing campaign.
Considering the information provided throughout the proposal, but also through the links and especially through the demo link, I consider the proposal to be highly impactful and well within the described statements of the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
The provided plan is described in detail. The timeline extends over a period of 4 months, and the tasks are organised in groups of 1-2 months. The proposers have provided a window for team selection, which is a highly important task at the start of each endeavour. The budget is grouped per team member’s job, with a monthly salary provided and a fixed number of months needed to finalise each task. As someone who has worked with creatives in this field, I can state that the amounts asked look reasonable and realistic. Although the team members for this proposal have not yet been hired, the proposers have provided us with the exact vacant jobs and some details about their current members. Overall, considering the amount of work that has been done so far, the working MVP and the fact that the team has been selected as part of the Ariob Incubator, developed in collaboration with IOG, I see no reason not to trust their skills, knowledge and dedication to the project. 
As such, I will rate the feasibility section a 5/5, as I have sufficient trust that the proposers are capable of implementing the project successfully.
f6_assessments.q2:
I appreciate the team’s dedication even in this case, the tracking of the proposal’s progress. They mentioned that they will have daily and weekly meetings to discuss and verify that each task and subtask has been completed. The monitoring will also be done on Github, which is a very fitting answer to provide for community evaluation.
The success definition is also comprehensively described, and I find no need for additional details.
Given the data provided, I am also rating this section a 5/5.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal is aligned with the campaign objectives to create awareness of existing product of cardano for easy adoption. This is important because the use of the platform would be a great achievement to trust and remove doubt about the blockchain technology in some parts of Africa.

The marketing is therefore an important opportunity to scale up adoption using the medical platform.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team is well experienced and the information provided about them is sufficient. They are organized and have made progress with a number developments in the tech environment. 
The schedules and milestones are concise and specific without deviating from the focus of creating awareness for the adoption of the system. The budget for the marketing of a sector specific technology is quite huge. Once it has been built, marketing is needed which required moderate amount to help in the adoption.
f6_assessments.q2: The GitHub platform is equally an important place to monitor progress. However, the team should provide some projected KPIs to show that, the community has some information to rely on to guide the evaluation and auditing of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal presents a very real challenge with health systems in Africa and the proposed solution is great. This will be a very impactful project since it provides opportunity for healthcare sectors to operate an online record systems that make work easier and more efficient. It is surprising to know that a number of health facilities still use physical folders which almost always leads to loss of patient records and relevant administrative information. The proposer also indicates onboarding of African health professionals through awareness creation and interactions using the Hippocrades healthcare systems. I believe this proposal addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team presented is experienced and they are already working on a funded project from project catalyst. The also gives links to relevant experience as evidence which is very important. The budget is reasonable and is well detailed. The proposers presents a clear plan with timelines and milestone to guide implementation and execution which is very significant to the implementation of a project. The proposers indicate they will come back for more funding if this is funded and they provide a plan on what what further funding is for. 
i think this proposal can be implemented successfully if funded.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal presents timelines for executing tasks within the project and that is good. What success looks like has also been presented by the proposers. They also indicate measuring success by number of sign ups on the Hippocrades system which is a measurable indicator. In all the proposal is auditable.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposer and their team have done a good work by placing their proposal in the right challenge category to addressing the CARDANO ecosystems, In the develops world health care is linked to the various places in services are provided but in Africa that is not the case. The proposer has widely articulate the volume of values this proposal will bring to cardano ecosystems in Africa, it has the estimated number of Doctors and health facilities in Africa and how the integration of this two key main metrics can potentially scale up the awareness and development of interest in project catalyst in the CARDANO blockchain industry. The proposer's also shown key metrics to measure is the onboarding of Doctors and the thousands of health care facilities in Africa who will intend onboard their patients on the Electronic Medical records, on this many exchanges will happen. The proposal has also indicate how this health providers can take the opportunity on cardano ecosystems to carry out millions of transactions on the Cardona ecosystems. The proposer identified that millions of health facilities do not have the electronic medical records system in place, i believe when this proposal is funded will raise awareness creation of health care solutions available on the CARDANO ecosystems. Proposer has already developed some solutions in relation to pharmacies and diagnostic centers has the ability to scale up to the future challenges that may come up with experience and expertise they have.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer and his team have provided references and links to some works done with relevant to their skills experts and experiences. The proposer has also named the team to work on the proposal as the core tech team made of up 10 members with their expertise outlined out in the proposal. The budget of the proposer is clearly provides how funds will allocate for various activities and are broken down into areas fund will be spended. Also a realistic timeliness and timetable are made ranging from 1month with their actions, 2-3month with their activities and the last month as 4month as the assessment month and it also has a planned detailing how resources will be utilized . The budget is realistic which will help meet the set goals. The proposer has also detailed plans on how to start, what to do and how to go about it. The proposer have identified some risks to the proposal but has put in place measure to meticulously tackle the risk such as putting together a digital marketing team composed of writers, content creators, and graphic artists. They would need to be immersed with the Hippocrades solutions and the also added and additional measure  on how to mitigate the risk by proper selection of the team, planning, and proactive participation of the core team of Hippocrades when funding is made available for the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer and his team have not provided a clear timeline for which achievement and success can measure but they  have linked it to SDG goal as a key indicator and other projects the Hippocrades platform which already has funding in the Cardano ecosystems on which their proposal can scale up the identified problem . It would been great if key metrics were outlined in the proposal as target to meet in achieving health care onboarding onto the Cardano blockchain ecosystems where patients, Doctors and health facilities in Africa are linked together. There were no understandable and effective solutions to the problem identified. I believe the proposer can relook at to ensure that metrics to measure success is linked well. Thank you

solution: Hippocrades has already built healthcare solutions for clinics and doctors (part of the Catalyst funding). We'll raise awareness and provide onboarding guidelines and tutorials in the African region.
experience: We are from the Hippocrades Teamthat has built a decentralized healthcare infrastructure for Cardano. We have been selected in the first batch of the Ariob Incubator / Iceaddis program in Africa which is supported by Cardano for high-potential startups.
